mapper.select: select bu1.name graParentName,bu1.id graParentId,bu2.id parentId, bu2.name parentName,bu3.name name,bu3.id userId,buf.id id,buf.status status from bidding_user_framework buf left join bidding_user bu1 on bu1.id=buf.gra_parent_id left join bidding_user bu2 on bu2.id=buf.parent_id left join bidding_user bu3 on bu3.id=buf.user_id where buf.delflag='0' and bu1.delflag='0' and bu2.delflag='0' and bu3.delflag='0' and buf.id=#{id}
select * from bidding_user_framework where (parent_id IS not NULL OR parent_id !='') and gra_parent_id=#{graParentId} and delflag='0'
select * from bidding_user_framework where (user_id is not null OR user_id !='') and parent_id=#{parentId} and delflag='0'
